portlet.name: portlet1
portlet.title: Title 1
portlet.query: select category, count(*) from product where %{'pippo'} is not null group by category order by category

useCase.name: active
useCase.query: from portofino.public.groups groups where groups.groupId not in (select groups2.groupId from portofino.public.users_groups ug inner join ug.group groups2 where ug.userid=%{userId} and ug.deletionDate is null)

useCase.name: current
useCase.query: from portofino.public.groups groups where groups.groupId in (select groups2.groupId from portofino.public.users_groups ug inner join ug.group groups2 where ug.userid=%{userId} and ug.deletionDate is null)

useCase.name: past
useCase.query: from portofino.public.users_groups ug where ug.userid=%{userId} and ug.deletionDate is not null
